trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Push-Location
trans-unit.target: Push-Location

trans-unit.source: Push-Location
trans-unit.target: Push-Location

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Adds the current location to the top of a location stack.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置添加到位置堆栈的顶部。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路径 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Push-Location** cmdlet adds, or pushes, the current location onto a location stack.
trans-unit.target: **Push-location** cmdlet 可添加，或将推送到位置堆栈当前的位置。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a path, this cmdlet pushes the current location onto a location stack and then changes the current location to the location specified by the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的路径，该 cmdlet 将推送到位置堆栈当前的位置，然后将当前位置更改到指定的路径的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Pop-Location cmdlet to get locations from the location stack.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 Pop-Location cmdlet 获取位置堆栈中的位置。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Push-Location** pushes the current location onto the current location stack, but you can use the *StackName* parameter to specify another location stack.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， **Push-location** 当前位置推当前位置堆栈，但您可以使用推送 *StackName* 参数来指定另一个位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: If the stack does not exist, **Push-Location** creates it.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈不存在， **Push-location** 将创建它。

trans-unit.source: For more information about location stacks, see the Notes.
trans-unit.target: 有关位置堆栈的详细信息，请参阅“备注”。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Change location
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 更改位置

trans-unit.source: This command pushes the current location onto the default location stack and then changes the location to C:\Windows.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前位置推入到默认位置堆栈中，然后将位置更改为 C:\Windows。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Change location in a named stack
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 更改命名堆栈中的位置

trans-unit.source: This command pushes the current location onto the RegFunction stack and changes the current location to the HKLM:\Software\Policies location.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前位置推入到 RegFunction 堆栈中，然后将当前位置更改为 HKLM:\Software\Policies 位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Location** cmdlets in any Windows PowerShell drive (PSDrive).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **位置** 任何 Windows PowerShell 驱动器 (PSDrive) 中的 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Push the current location onto the default stack
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 推送到默认堆栈当前的位置

trans-unit.source: This command pushes the current location onto the default stack.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前位置推入到默认堆栈中。

trans-unit.source: It does not change the location.
trans-unit.target: 它不会更改位置。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Create and use a named stack
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 创建和使用命名的堆栈

trans-unit.source: These commands show how to create and use a named location stack.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令展示了如何创建和使用已命名的位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: The first command pushes the current location onto a new stack named Stack2, and then changes the current location to the root directory (%USERPROFILE%), which is represented in the command by the tilde symbol (~) or $home.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令将当前位置到名为 Stack2，新堆栈上推，然后将当前位置更改到 root 目录 （%USERPROFILE%)，由波形符 （~） 或 $home 表示命令中。

trans-unit.source: If Stack2 does not already occur in the session, **Push-Location** creates it.
trans-unit.target: 如果在会话中，已不存在 Stack2 **Push-location** 将创建它。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses **Pop-Location** to pop the original location (PS C:\\\>) from the Stack2 stack.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Pop-location** 弹出原始位置 (PS c:\\\>) 从 Stack2 堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Without *StackName*, **Pop-Location** would pop the location from the unnamed default stack.
trans-unit.target: 而无需 *StackName*, ，**Pop-location** 会弹出未命名的默认堆栈中的位置。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the new location.
trans-unit.target: 指定新位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the *Path* parameter, the value of the *LiteralPath* parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与不同 *路径* 参数、 的值 *LiteralPath* 完全按照其键入使用参数。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配字符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Passes an object that represents the location to the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 将传递一个对象，表示到管道的位置。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the new location.
trans-unit.target: 指定新位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet your location to the location specified by this path after it adds, or pushes, the current location onto the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 您的位置的位置由指定此路径添加，或将推送到堆栈的顶部当前位置之后。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path of any location whose provider supports this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 输入其提供程序支持此 cmdlet 的任何位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -StackName
trans-unit.target: -StackName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location stack to which the current location is added.
trans-unit.target: 指定要将当前位置添加到的位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Enter a location stack name.
trans-unit.target: 输入位置堆栈名称。

trans-unit.source: If the stack does not exist, **Push-Location** creates it.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈不存在， **Push-location** 将创建它。

trans-unit.source: Without this parameter, **Push-Location** adds the location to the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此参数， **Push-location** 将位置添加到当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: By default, the current location stack is the unnamed default location stack that Windows PowerShell creates.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当前位置堆栈为 Windows PowerShell 创建的未命名的默认位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: To make a location stack the current location stack, use the *StackName* parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个位置以堆栈当前位置堆栈，使用 *StackName* Set-location cmdlet 的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about location stacks, see the Notes.
trans-unit.target: 有关位置堆栈的详细信息，请参阅“备注”。

trans-unit.source: **Push-Location** cannot add a location to the unnamed default stack unless it is the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: **Push-location** 不能将位置添加到未命名的默认堆栈，除非该堆栈为当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path, but not a literal path, to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递一个字符串，包含一个路径，但不是文本路径，此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None, System.Management.Automation.PathInfo
trans-unit.target: 无、 System.Management.Automation.PathInfo

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet generates a **System.Management.Automation.PathInfo** object that represents the location, if you specify the *PassThru* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 生成 **System.Management.Automation.PathInfo** 对象，表示该位置，如果您指定 *PassThru* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: A stack is a last-in, first-out list in which only the most recently added item can be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈是上一次在先进先出列表可以在其中访问最后添加的项。

trans-unit.source: You add items to a stack in the order that you use them, and then retrieve them for use in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 采用要使用项的顺序将这些项添加到堆栈，然后采用相反顺序检索这些项以供使用。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell lets you store provider locations in location stacks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 可帮助你在位置堆栈中存储提供程序位置。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell creates an unnamed default location stack and you can create multiple named location stacks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 创建一个未命名的默认位置堆栈，你可以创建多个命名的位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a stack name, Windows PowerShell uses the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定位置堆栈，则 Windows PowerShell 使用当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: By default, the unnamed default location is the current location stack, but you can use **Set-Location** to change the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未命名的默认位置为当前位置堆栈，但可以使用 **Set-location** 更改当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: To manage location stacks, use the Windows PowerShell**Location** cmdlets, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 若要管理位置堆栈，使用 Windows PowerShell**位置** cmdlet，如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: To add a location to a location stack, use the **Push-Location** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要将某个位置添加到某个位置堆栈，使用 **Push-location** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To get a location from a location stack, use the **Pop-Location** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要从某个位置堆栈获取位置，请使用 **Pop-location** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To display the locations in the current location stack, use the *Stack* parameter of the **Get-Location** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示当前位置堆栈中的位置，请使用 *堆栈* 参数 **Get-location** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To display the locations in a named location stack, use the *StackName* parameter of the **Get-Location** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示命名的位置堆栈中的位置，请使用 *StackName* 参数 **Get-location** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To create a new location stack, use the *StackName* parameter of the **Push-Location** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的位置堆栈，请使用 *StackName* 参数 **Push-location** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a stack that does not exist, **Push-Location** creates the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的堆栈中不存在， **Push-location** 创建堆栈。

trans-unit.source: To make a location stack the current location stack, use the *StackName* parameter of the **Set-Location** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个位置以堆栈当前位置堆栈，使用 *StackName* 参数 **Set-location** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The unnamed default location stack is fully available only when it is the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 仅当其是当前位置堆栈时，未命名的默认位置堆栈并完全可用。

trans-unit.source: If you make a named location stack the current location stack, you can no longer use **Push-Location** or **Pop-Location** cmdlets add or get items from the default stack or use a **Get-Location** command to display the locations in the unnamed stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果使命名的位置堆栈当前位置堆栈，您不能再使用 **Push-location** 或 **Pop-location** cmdlet 添加或从默认堆栈或使用中获取项 **Get-location** 命令以显示未命名堆栈中的位置。

trans-unit.source: To make the unnamed stack the current stack, use the *StackName* parameter of **Set-Location** with a value of $Null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要使未命名的堆栈当前的堆栈，请使用 *StackName* 参数 **Set-location** ，值为 $Null 或为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Push-Location** by its built-in alias, **pushd**.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以指 **Push-location** 别名来对其内置 **pushd**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: **Push-Location** is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: **Push-location** 用于处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type `Get-PSProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入 `Get-PSProvider`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.source: Get-Location
trans-unit.target: 获得位置

trans-unit.source: Pop-Location
trans-unit.target: Pop-Location

trans-unit.source: Set-Location
trans-unit.target: Set-Location
